## Introduction

Our main goal was to find what was the most popular Genre/Game for Esports 


## Data Analysis Plan

- Which game(s) has the most earnings overall

- Which game has the lowest earnings overall

- What is the gap of earnings between the top game and the second most total earned game

- Any relation between total earnings and tournaments

##  Data


This dataset includes information of generic data on each esports related title which can be found at https://www.kaggle.com/rankirsh/esports-earnings. The data fields that are included are: Game, Release Date, Genre, Total Earnings, Online Earnings, Total Players, and Total Tournaments.
